name: Format\Addition
description: Properties shared by all addition types.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of addition. For example, Link.

properties.name: rangeLength
properties.description: The length of the range of text the component should be anchored to.

properties.name: rangeStart
properties.description: The start index of the range of text the component should be anchored to. When a component is anchored to a component with role of body, the text might be flowed around the component.
